article_title: What Will Republican Control Of The Senate Mean For Small Businesses?

article_metadata.description: Now that the Republican Party has won control of the Senate, what’s ahead and how can you position your company for a Republican legislative branch and a Democratic executive office?
article_metadata.author: AllBusiness
